idea: In the digital era, we believe every enterprise must have a way to auto-capture their visitors, followers, subscribers, messengers, and responders from various social media platforms or email activities in a systematic manner. Later, the sales and marketing team can easily nurture the leads or prospects using the power of enterprise software applications (like CRM) to win the opportunity and generate insightful reports.
name: iHonest

idea:
Our start up is exploring an opportunity in manufacturing of an averagely priced wearing apparel commonly quoted as Jeans. The operations of the business involves huge involvement of labor as the proposed startup.

Under the current scenario of lockdown /pandemic which has led to large scale unemployment and mass layoff by various organisation on account of various reasons like automation of various processes and cost cutting.Our start up is projecting a large scale employment though over period of time as the volume increases as our manufacturing process is more dependent on manual labor then on automation.
name: LOG-IN JEANS LLP

name: INNOV ACQUIRE (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Book My Diamond Pvt Ltd runs app based diamond trading platforms on the Apple AppStore and the Google Playstore for spot trading in diamonds. These apps and the all the technology required to run the platform is designed and developed in-house. Book My Diamond Pvt Ltd trades in diamonds and all the operations related to logistics, value assessment and quality assessment are done in-house. Book My Diamond Pvt Ltd innovates the way diamonds are traded and markets it out the retail jewellers across the country and trains them and their staff to use the platform for easy and effective diamond trading. Book My Diamond Pvt Ltd on boards sellers of diamonds and electronically integrates with their technologies to validate authenticity of data. Book My Diamond Pvt Ltd also provides software as a service to retail jewellers. This service is customised to the needs of every individual diamond retail jeweller which helps them effectively sell diamonds at their sales counter and communicate with their sales and purchase teams effectively. Book My Diamond Pvt Ltd constantly researches technologies and markets to constantly innovate and build new technologies and business models to scale their own business and to add more value to their customers.
name: BOOK MY DIAMOND PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Let's Burn is a firm which aims at improving the fitness level of athletes by providing them with specialised strength and conditioning workouts with the help of skilled coaches.
name: Let's Burn

idea: Designers Door - A platform that aims at bridging the gap between art, fashion and design college students and the industry by providing them practical exposure in the form of internship listings from brands, blogs and tips via design aluminis and interviews with industry professionals.
name: Designers Door

name: E-NETSPIDER INDIA

idea:
The automobile industry is in the midst of a huge technological disruption.

Today, Electric vehicle is the preferred choice because of its inherent efficiency that will shape urban commute and the cities of tomorrow. In parallel, the world around us is getting connected, enabling the integration of devices, and making our life experiences seamless. With the projection of an exponential increase in the number of Electric Vehicles, establishing the infrastructure of charging stations has become the need of the time. With its innumerable benefits, EVs have the limitation of the travel range. To tackle this unique and long troubling problem, Ionic Technologies Ltd. has come up with the concept called AutoBank.


AutoBank genuinely believes in power and time saving and Eco-Friendly environment. Quality over Quantity is more important in selecting a battery.


We are a socially aware, professional company that values customers. AutoBank is developing distinct batteries like Wired Batteries, Wireless Battery, Fast Charging Wired Batteries, Fast charging Wireless battery. Although, the batteries are in the prototype stage at this point. Our companyâ€™s USP offered is portable batteries which can charge electric vehicles even when they are in running condition.
name: Autobank

idea: Data Analytics, Software, Artificial Intelligence etc.
name: OPUS-ANALYTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
